title: Are telecom companies from China the global innovation hotspots for telecom sector? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have to say that the telecom companies like Huawei in China really did a good job in the world. Not only because its technical advantages, but also low human cost. However, the development of communication technology is changing rapidly, and become diversity. It's really hard to say. The Chinese telecom companies are trying their best to make their dream come true.

Yes, it is significant. There was a feeling that Huawei etc were only winning because they were cheap and/or they stole things from Western firms.   That was not true - and I don't think anyone says it any more. They are winning business because they are very innovative, driven organisations.  That said...  Cryptic financing & soft-loans from Govt might help too
